name: Marigold
description:
Hello everyone!

We want to introduce ourselves and tell you a little about the game we were working so hard on. KaSgar team is a passionate duo of young hobbyists that wanted to gain experience and skills trough work and dedication. We worked hard and dedicated a lot of our time, to deliver our most ambitious project yet...

Marigold

Spirit hoarder exiled from his home commits to his research on animation with limited resources, using spirits of animals to create nature defiling creatures. To makes his creations stronger he needs a familiar tome that young half-elf wizard Marigold possesses. Player's task is to defend mage's home for few nights untill she becomes strong enough, to defeat the mastermind once and for all.

Gameplay

Marigold is a hybrid of classic tower defense games and targeted spellcasting. Enemies come from the dark forest and player will defend the barrier protecting wizard's home with fire spells. In order to succeed you will have to master combining spells and memorize some attack patterns, while improvising with flashy magic!

Ending word

Marigold is a passion/learning project, that's why we're publishing it for free! It's our first big game. We know it isn't perfect, but we still love it! We learned so much during development. We want to thank anyone that helped us in the process of creating Marigold, our amazing testers, our lovely friends and family.

Donation

We know that the game isn't AAA quality, but if you like what you see, or you want to support us  - consider donating a little! It'll help us greatly and motivate us to work on future projects!
